description:
Montreal, Oct. 20, 2014 - Eleyine Zarour demonstrates how she used Django coupled with Scipy to automate microscopy data analysis tasks during her undergraduate research project in biology.

Useful links:
* Eleyine Zarour: http://sflx.ca/ezarour
* FRAP: http://sflx.ca/frap
* MP49: http://sflx.ca/mp49f
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://sflx.ca/jobs
title: Automating microscopy data analysis using Django and Scipy #MP49
